name: Bits Adventure
description:
The world has been invaded by the creatures of darkness!
Only a true hero can save the world, or die trying ...

This challenging retro 8bit platformer action game with pleasing colors and textures WILL CHALLENGE you in a series of worlds with increasingly extreme difficulty! Your mission: DO NOT DIE.

Your only weapon will help you defeat all the enemies in each level, your ammo is infinite, but be careful, if you touch an enemy they will weaken you to death.

DO YOU HAVE what it takes to be the HERO?

- Defeat different enemies to finish each level!
- Your skill and agility is the only thing that will help you, be careful at every step!
- Fight challenging bosses who will rile you up and make you want to cry, but STOP! heroes do not cry, do not lose patience!
- Select your favorite HERO in the shop!
- Buy items that will help you on the battlefield, they are not cheap, so be smart when using them!
- Enjoy retro-style controls in the palm of your hand!

What are you waiting for? Prove you are the HERO of the world! PLAY NOW FOR FREE!
